Uses of Class
controller.InexistingUserIdException

  • Packages that use InexistingUserIdException 
    Package Description
    controller  
    ui.clui  

    • Uses of InexistingUserIdException in controller

      Methods in controller that throw InexistingUserIdException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card NetworkManager.findCardByUserId(int id, Network net)
      This method finds a Card in a Network according to the owner ID.
      User NetworkManager.findUserById(int id, Network net)
      This method finds a User in a Network according to the user ID.
      void NetworkManager.rentBike(int userId, int stationId, int bikeType, java.time.LocalDateTime pickUpTime, Network net)
      This methods makes a user rent a bike of a specified type.
      void NetworkManager.rentBike(int userId, int stationId, java.time.LocalDateTime pickUpTime, Network net)
      This methods makes a user rent a bike, without taking care of the type.
      double NetworkManager.returnBike(int userId, int stationId, java.time.LocalDateTime returnTime, Network net)
      This method makes a user return a bike.

    • Uses of InexistingUserIdException in ui.clui

      Methods in ui.clui that throw InexistingUserIdException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CommandLineController.calculateItinerary(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method applies command line instructions of the form:
      calculateItinerary <networkName> <userID> <startX> <startY> <destinationX> <destinationY> <pathStrategy>
      The pathStrategy can be minimal-walking, fastest-path, prefer-plus, avoid-plus, or uniformity.
      void CommandLineController.displayItinerary(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method applies command line instructions of the form:
      displayItinerary <networkName> <userID>
      void CommandLineController.displayUser(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method applies command line instructions of the form:
      displayUser <networkName> <userID>
      void CommandLineReader.interpreteCommand(java.lang.String instruction, CommandLineController clc)
      This method calls the method of the CommandLineController corresponding to the instruction.
      void CommandLineController.rentBike(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method applies command line instructions of the form:
      rentBike <userID> <stationID> <bikeType> <time> <networkName>
      The time has to be on the following format: YYYY-MM-dd HH:mm The type has to be electric or mechanic.
      void CommandLineController.returnBike(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method applies command line instructions of the form:
      returnBike <userID> <stationID> <time> <networkName>
      The time has to be on the following format: YYYY-MM-dd HH:mm
